section-title.title: Contact
section-title.resumeMe: Hi everyone, in this section I will present all my educational and professional experiences in order to make myself known. I am a software developer with a humanistic background but that hasn't stopped me from becoming who I am now.
section-title.presento:
I'm a universitary student enrolled to the second year of Ingegneria e Scienze Informatiche in Cesena.
I'm a web and software developer.

row.des: When designing a site you need to think of it in a way that is easy for the customer to understand and use. That is what I always try to do first.
